attributes.action: hand himself over to the International Criminal Court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stand trial for the deaths of thousands as a result of his foreign policy. This action is in regards to Afganistan and Iraq. Whereas other world leaders have paid the price it is now time for Mr Blair to face justice in the Hague.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
